Articles.Content: I was thinking about the upcoming 1 loaded vessel, 1 thread system. Because stock turret bearings almost always use two vessels this will allow much larger tank battles for the battle thread! Because most stock tanks have 1/5 of their parts in the turret this will stop the enemy tank, turret and your turret from effecting the lag because they will all be on separate threads! (This is how it works right?)
Uh... what? There are no stock tanks, unless you count fuel tanks, which is what everyone reading this is going to immediately think you mean.
Battle tanks made from stock parts. It's a thing.

Battle tanks made from stock parts. It's a thing.

Not only Tanks

@Rath

I think we will see a lot of improvement once KSP is ported to the new Version of Unity.

Quite frankly nobody can give a clear Statement about how much improvement we are speaking of because Squad hasnt finished the port yet and has to rebuild some area's of the game.

Plus, they surely dont want to raise expectations they cann't hold for unexpected reasons.

So we just have to wait, but my guess is, that we will mention a difference once 1.1 is out. Like a Solar Eclipse on a sunny day

Edited September 19, 2015 by MalfunctionM1Ke
